clauses.text: Customer shall pay all undisputed invoices within 30 days of receipt. Payment shall be made via wire transfer or credit card to the account specified by Provider.
Late payments shall accrue interest at the rate of 1.5% per month (or the maximum rate permitted by law, whichever is lower) from the due date until paid in full.
Annual subscription fees shall be paid in advance at the start of each subscription year. Monthly plans shall be billed in advance on the same day each month.
